belief3.description: Roll back to a checkpoint, fix the issue, continue. No need to start over.

belief4.description: Every action, every decision, every approval is logged and timestamped.

mission.description: Automation should empower people, not replace them. We believe in tools that enhance human capabilities while keeping you in control.
mission.statement: To make powerful automation accessible to everyone, while maintaining transparency and human oversight.
mission.title: Our Mission

hero.description: We're building the future of workflow automation - transparent, verifiable, and human-first.
hero.title: About Flyto2

allOrNothing.title: All-or-Nothing Execution
allOrNothing.desc: Traditional RPA runs until completion or crash. No middle ground. When processing 1,000 records, you won't know something's wrong until the damage has spread across the entire dataset.

noApproval.title: No Approval Workflow
noApproval.desc: Most RPA tools can't pause for human approval. In regulated industries where every action needs verification, this makes critical processes impossible to automate.

validation.title: Validation is an Afterthought
validation.desc: Data validation in traditional RPA is bolted on, not built in. When data doesn't match expectations, workflows fail silently, leaving corrupted records with no clear recovery path.

cloud.title: Cloud Dependency
cloud.desc: Enterprise data often can't leave your network. Most modern automation platforms require cloud connectivity, making them unsuitable for air-gapped environments or strict compliance requirements.

problem.subtitle: Most automation tools have a fundamental flaw: they're designed to run without human intervention.
problem.title: Problems Traditional RPA

step1.title: Input Validation
step1.desc: Every module validates inputs before execution. Wrong data types? Missing fields? The workflow stops immediately with clear error messages.

step2.title: Schema Enforcement
step2.desc: Data flowing between modules must conform to defined schemas. No silent type coercion, no 'sometimes it works' scenarios.

step3.title: Output Validation
step3.desc: After each step completes, outputs are validated against expected schemas. If anything's off, you know before it affects downstream processes.

step4.title: Checkpoint Creation
step4.desc: At configurable intervals, Flyto2 creates checkpoints. If validation fails later, you can roll back to the last known good state.

validation.subtitle: Most automation failures aren't logic errors - they're data errors that weren't caught in time.
validation.title: Why Validation Must Be Built Into

approval.title: Human Approval Steps
approval.desc: Build approval checkpoints directly into your workflow. Critical actions wait for human confirmation before proceeding.

rollback.title: Rollback & Resume
rollback.desc: Mistakes don't mean starting over. Roll back to a checkpoint, fix the issue, and continue from where you left off.

builtin.title: Built-in Validation
builtin.desc: Data validation isn't an add-on. Every module validates inputs and outputs. Malformed data stops the workflow immediately with clear error messages.

offline.title: 100% Offline
offline.desc: No cloud dependencies. No phoning home. Deploy on your infrastructure with complete data sovereignty.

audit.title: Full Audit Trail
audit.desc: Every action has screenshots, logs, and timestamps. Know exactly what happened, when, and who approved it. Perfect for compliance.

pause.title: Pause Anytime
pause.desc: Every workflow can pause for human review. Run one, confirm it's right, then continue batch processing. No more blind automation.

solution.subtitle: Flyto2 doesn't distinguish between 'automation logic' and 'user interaction'. They're the same thing.
solution.title: Why Workflows and Interfaces Must Be

hero.description: Traditional RPA fails when human judgment is needed. Flyto2 makes human oversight a core feature from day one, not an afterthought.
hero.title: A Workflow Platform That

approval.problem: Traditional automation can't pause for approval. Purchase orders, expense reports, and contracts need manager sign-off, but RPA tools just barrel through.
approval.quote: "We automated 200+ approval workflows while keeping the human judgment compliance requires."

migration.title: Migration Path
migration.desc: Already invested in UiPath, Blue Prism, or Automation Anywhere? Here's how Flyto2 complements (not replaces) your existing setup:

rpa.subtitle: When your systems don't have APIs but you need automation
rpa.keepRpa: Keep using your existing RPA for:
rpa.problem: Your internal admin portal has no API. Your ERP is from 2005. Your vendor portal only works in Internet Explorer. You can't wait years for IT to build integrations.
rpa.title: Replace RPA for Internal Tools

insight.title: Key Insight
insight.desc: The best automation isn't fully automatic. It's automation that knows its limits and asks for help when needed.

step3.label: Exception Pause:
step3.text: Flag unusual amounts, missing data, duplicates

step4.label: Human Review:
step4.text: Operator reviews and approves/rejects flagged items

step5.label: Continue:
step5.text: Process approved items, skip rejected ones

hitl.subtitle: Automation that pauses at critical moments for verification
hitl.problem: Automation works great for 95% of cases. But that 5% edge case can cause massive damage if handled automatically. You need automation that knows when to stop and ask.
hitl.title: Human-in-the-Loop Automation
hitl.when2: Data that doesn't match expected patterns
hitl.when5: Any action that's hard to undo

balance.title: The Right Balance
balance.desc: AI should amplify human capabilities, not replace human judgment. Flyto2 is designed with this principle at its core.

ai.approachDesc: AI is powerful but not infallible. Flyto2 lets you leverage AI for suggestions and analysis while keeping humans in control of final decisions.

step2.label: AI:
step2.text: Extract vendor, amount, line items, due date

step4.label: Human:
step4.text: Review flagged items, correct if needed

step5.label: Process:
step5.text: Create AP entry, route for approval

ai.subtitle: Let AI suggest, let humans decide
ai.title: AI-Assisted Operations Workflow

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your cloud plan at any time. For offline licenses, you can upgrade by paying the difference.
faq.a2: Your workflows continue to work indefinitely. You only lose access to updates and support. Renew anytime to get the latest features.
faq.a3: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. No questions asked.
faq.a4: Absolutely! The open source core is MIT licensed. You can use it for any purpose, including commercial projects.
faq.q2: What happens when my offline license expires?
faq.q4: Can I use the free version commercially?
